data.title: Change the font size on your iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch
data.meta_description: You can change the size of your font in Mail, Contacts, Calendar, Phone, Notes, and other apps that support Dynamic Type.
data.text:
You can change the size of your font in Mail, Contacts, Calendar, Phone, Notes, and other apps that support Dynamic Type.

Change the font size

Go to Settings > Display & Brightness, then select Text Size.

Drag the slider to select the font size you want.

Make the font even bigger

Go to Settings > Accessibility, then select Display & Text Size.

Tap Larger Text for larger font options.

Drag the slider to select the font size you want.

Making the text too large might make it hard to tap buttons or other functions within apps. Go back to your settings and adjust the font size as needed.
